participant_1.background:

I have no siblings, but I love spending time with my friends and family at our cabin in the woods on the lake.
i volunteer in my sons boy scout troop.
i know how to drive a truck.
I'm feeling nostalgic today, so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood.

content.text: Hey I'm feeling nostalgic today, so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood. What are you up to?
I'm adjusting to college life and still trying to find my way around, but it's been fun so far. What type of movies do you like to watch?
I like old movies from the 80s and 90s, like The Breakfast Club and The Princess Bride.
Those are great movies! I love The Breakfast Club. What's your favorite part?
I love the scene where they all break down and talk about their problems. It's so relatable.
Yeah, that's a great scene. I also love the ending, when they all realize that they're not so different after all.
Me too. It's such a heartwarming movie. What's your favorite movie from the 80s or 90s?
I think my favorite movie from that time period is probably The Princess Bride. I love the story and the characters. It's such a classic.
That's a great choice! It's definitely one of my favorites too.
Have you seen the movie Clue?
No, I haven't heard of it. What's it about?
It's a mystery movie set in a mansion. It's really funny and suspenseful. You should check it out!
I will, thanks for the recommendation
